exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type D : cpo s : chain [cpoofA -> D] x : A Unable to unify "CPO.mx_lim (CPO.mixin (CPO.class D))" with "CPO.mx_lim (CPO.mixin (CPO.class [cpoofA -> D])) s".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Type
D: cpo
s: chain [cpoofA -> D]
x: A

Goal:
lim s x = lim (app_chain s x)

Premises:
Notation cpo := CPO.type
Notation lim := @CPO.lim
Record chain (T : poset) : Type := Chain { pred_of : Pred T; _ : chain_axiom pred_of } Arguments Chain [T pred_of]
app_chain : forall (A : Type) (T : poset), chain [posetofA -> T] -> A -> chain T
limP : forall (D : cpo) (s : chain D) (x : D), x \In s -> x <== lim s
lim_liftE : forall (D : cpo) (s : chain D), lim s = lim (lift_chain s)
limM : forall (D : cpo) (s : chain D) (x : D), (forall y : D, y \In s -> y <== x) -> lim s <== x
dapp_mono : forall x0 : ?A, monotone (@^~ x0) where ?A : [A : Type D : cpo s : chain [cpoofA -> D] x : A |- Type] ?T : [A : Type D : cpo s : chain [cpoofA -> D] x : A |- ?A -> poset]
app_mono : forall x0 : ?A, monotone (@^~ x0) where ?A : [A : Type D : cpo s : chain [cpoofA -> D] x : A |- Type] ?T : [A : Type D : cpo s : chain [cpoofA -> D] x : A |- poset]
sub_limX : forall (D : cpo) (s : Pred D), chain_closed s -> forall u : chain (subPoset s), lim [sval^^ubysval_mono (s:=s)] \In s
chain_closed = fun T : cpo => [Pred s | bot \In s /\ (forall d : chain T, d <=p s -> lim d \In s)] : forall T : cpo, Simpl_Pred (Pred T) Arguments chain_closed {T}
limE : forall (D : cpo) (s1 s2 : chain D), s1 =p s2 -> lim s1 = lim s2
lim_mono : forall (D : cpo) (s1 s2 : chain D), s1 <=p s2 -> lim s1 <== lim s2
onPhantom : forall (P : ?T -> Prop) (x : ?T), phantom Prop (P x) where ?T : [A : Type D : cpo s : chain [cpoofA -> D] x : A |- Type]
dfun_limP : forall (A : Type) (B : A -> cpo) (s : chain (dfunPoset (fun x : A => B x))) (x : dfunPoset (fun x : A => B x)), x \In s -> x <== dfun_lim s
dfun_limM : forall (A : Type) (B : A -> cpo) (s : chain (dfunPoset (fun x : A => B x))) (x : dfunPoset (fun x : A => B x)), (forall y : dfunPoset (fun x0 : A => B x0), y \In s -> y <== x) -> dfun_lim s <== x
lat_limP : forall (A : lattice) (s : chain A) (x : A), x \In s -> x <== lat_lim s
fun_limP : forall (A : Type) (B : cpo) (s : chain [posetofA -> B]) (x : [posetofA -> B]), x \In s -> x <== fun_lim s
CPOMixin : forall (T : poset) (mx_bot : T) (mx_lim : chain T -> T), (forall x : T, mx_bot <== x) -> (forall (s : chain T) (x : T), x \In s -> x <== mx_lim s) -> (forall (s : chain T) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> y <== x) -> mx_lim s <== x) -> CPO.mixin_of T
pair_limP : forall (A B : cpo) (s : chain [posetofA * B]) (x : [posetofA * B]), x \In s -> x <== pair_lim s
prop_lim = fun s : chain [posetofProp] => exists p : [posetofProp], p \In s /\ p : chain [posetofProp] -> [posetofProp]
lat_limM : forall (A : lattice) (s : chain A) (x : A), (forall y : A, y \In s -> y <== x) -> lat_lim s <== x
sub_lim : forall (D : cpo) (s : Pred D), chain_closed s -> chain (subPoset s) -> subPoset s
fun_limM : forall (A : Type) (B : cpo) (s : chain [posetofA -> B]) (x : [posetofA -> B]), (forall y : [posetofA -> B], y \In s -> y <== x) -> fun_lim s <== x
prop_limP : forall (s : chain [posetofProp]) (p : [posetofProp]), p \In s -> p <== prop_lim s
Record mixin_of (T : poset) : Type := Mixin { mx_bot : Poset.sort T; mx_lim : chain T -> T; _ : forall x : T, mx_bot <== x; _ : forall (s : chain T) (x : T), x \In s -> x <== mx_lim s; _ : forall (s : chain T) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> y <== x) -> mx_lim s <== x } Arguments CPO.Mixin [T mx_bot] [mx_lim]%function_scope (_ _ _)%function_scope
pair_limM : forall (A B : cpo) (s : chain [posetofA * B]) (x : [posetofA * B]), (forall y : [posetofA * B], y \In s -> y <== x) -> pair_lim s <== x
prop_limM : forall (s : chain [posetofProp]) (p : [posetofProp]), (forall q : [posetofProp], q \In s -> q <== p) -> prop_lim s <== p
supP : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred T) (x : T), x \In s -> x <== sup s
chain_clos_idemp : forall (T : cpo) (s : Pred T), chain_closed s -> chain_closure s =p s
supM : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred T) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> y <== x) -> sup s <== x
dfun_lim : forall (A : Type) (B : A -> cpo), chain (dfunPoset (fun x : A => B x)) -> dfunPoset (fun x : A => B x)
chain_clos_min : forall (T : cpo) (s : Pred T) (t : Pred_Class), s <=p t -> chain_closed t -> chain_closure s <=p t
lat_lim : forall A : lattice, chain A -> A
dapp_chain : forall (A : Type) (T : A -> poset), chain (dfunPoset T) -> forall x : A, chain (T x)
sub_bot : forall (D : cpo) (s : Pred D), chain_closed s -> {x : D | Mem s x}
proj1_diagE : forall (T : poset) (s : chain T), proj1_chain (diag_chain s) = s
proj2_diagE : forall (T : poset) (s : chain T), proj2_chain (diag_chain s) = s
id_chainE : forall (T : poset) (s : chain T) (M : monotone id), [id^^sbyM] = s
subCPO : forall (D : cpo) (s : Pred D), chain_closed s -> cpo
chain_clos_sub : forall (T : cpo) (s : Pred T), s <=p chain_closure s
subCPOMixin : forall (D : cpo) (s : Pred D), chain_closed s -> CPO.mixin_of (subPoset s)
Mem = fun (T : Type) (pT : PredType T) => nosimpl (let '@PropPredType _ Pred_Sort0 toPred s as pT0 := pT return (pT0 -> Mem_Pred T) in let '@exist _ _ mem _ as s0 := s return (PropPredType s0 -> Mem_Pred T) in mem) : forall (T : Type) (pT : PredType T), pT -> Mem_Pred T Arguments Mem {T}%type_scope {pT}
pair_lim : forall A B : cpo, chain [posetofA * B] -> [posetofA * B]

```  
unfold lim. unfold app_chain. apply f_equal. apply functional_extensionality. intro c. apply (limM _ _ (s c)). intros x H. apply H.
```
